original_title: 16-hour water cut to several areas in Colombo
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The National Water Supply and Drainage Board says that a 16-hour water cut will be imposed in parts of Colombo from 5 pm Saturday (12) to 9 am Sunday(13).
Accordingly, the water supply will be disrupted in Colombo 11,12,13,14, and 15 during this period.
